name: Tiki Quest
description:
Controls :
Arrow Keys to Move (or WASD)
Space Bar to  Jump / Double Jump

Items :

  

Hit the Boss | Heal 1 Heart | Regen 1 Platform

=======================================

Embark on a fight against a huge boss, and try not to fall as the terrain crumbles. Jump, get items and be quick in this original platformer concept !

This project has been created by 6 students during the Vim Jam 2 in 10 days.
